xwikidoc.name: LandingPageLogTemplate
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.LudovicDubost
xwikidoc.content:
#set($stream_name="AdWordsJump") #set($hql_from_where="from ActivityEventImpl as act where act.stream='${stream_name}' and act.type='Log' and act.page='${doc.getFullName()}'") #if($request.flag) #if($request.flag == "clear") #set($log_infos=$xwiki.activitystream.searchEvents("act.stream='${stream_name}' and act.type='Log' and act.page='${doc.getFullName()}'",false,0,0)) $xwiki.activitystream.deleteActivityEvents($log_infos) #elseif($request.flag == "delete" && $request.eventId) #set($log_infos=$xwiki.activitystream.searchEvents("act.eventId='${request.eventId}'",false,0,0)) #if($log_infos.size()==1) $xwiki.activitystream.deleteActivityEvent($log_infos.get(0)) #end #end #end #macro(pageViewLinks $itemsPerPage $totalPages $crtPageNumber) #set($rurl = $xwiki.getRequestURL()) #set($idx = $rurl.indexOf("?")) #if($idx > 0) #set($rurl = ($rurl.substring(0, $idx))) #end #set($params = '') #if($request.ipp1) #set($params = $params + '&ipp1='+$request.ipp1) #end #if($request.page1) #set($params = $params + '&page1='+$request.page1) #end #if($totalPages > 0)
#if($crtPageNumber > 0) #set($prevPage = $crtPageNumber - 1) << < #else << < #end #set($displayCrtPageNumber = $crtPageNumber + 1) #set($displayTotalPages = $totalPages + 1) $displayCrtPageNumber / $displayTotalPages #if($crtPageNumber < $totalPages) #set($nextPage = $crtPageNumber + 1) > >> #else > >> #end
#end #end ##=================== get paging parameters #set($itemsPerPage = 5) #set($pageNumber = 0) #if($request.docname && $request.docname == ${doc.fullName}) #if($request.ipp) #set($itemsPerPage = $xwiki.parseInt($request.ipp)) #end #if($request.page) #set($pageNumber = $xwiki.parseInt($request.page)) #end #end #set($startAt = $itemsPerPage * $pageNumber) #if($startAt < 0) #set($startAt = 0) #end ##=================== set paging values #set($count=$xwiki.search("select count(*) ${hql_from_where}").get(0)) #set($endAt = $itemsPerPage * ($pageNumber + 1)) #if($endAt > $count) #set($endAt = $count) #end #if($startAt > $endAt) #set($startAt = $endAt) #end #set($totalPages = ($count - 1) / $itemsPerPage) #set($crtPageNumber = $startAt / $itemsPerPage) #set($log_infos=$xwiki.search("${hql_from_where} order by param1",$itemsPerPage,$startAt)) ##=================== show content #set($docname = ${doc.name}) #if($docname.endsWith("Log")) #set($len = $docname.length() - 3) #set($docname = $docname.substring(0, $len)) #end #set($inputurl = $xwiki.getURL("AdWordsJump.$docname", "view","xpage=popup")) #subtitlebar(${doc.name} "View" "$inputurl" "purple") #set($class=$xwiki.getDocument($classname).getxWikiClass()) #set($bar_title="Log") #set($searchTime_prop=$class.get("searchTime")) #set($searchText_prop=$class.get("searchText")) #set($email_prop=$class.get("email")) #set($inform=$class.get("inform")) #set($counter = 0) #foreach ($log_info in $log_infos) #set($searchTime=$log_info.param1) #set($log_title=$bar_title+":  "+$searchTime)
#set($del_url=$doc.getURL("view","flag=delete&eventId=${log_info.eventId}")) #set($del_url="javascript:if(window.confirm('Are you sure to delete it?')) location.href='$del_url';") #titlebar($log_title "DEL" $del_url "purple")
#set($to_trim = $doc.name.length() - 3)
Email:$!log_info.param4
Search Term:$!log_info.param2
Date Created:$!searchTime
Is Permission:$!log_info.param3
Landing Page:${doc.name.substring(0, $to_trim)}
#set($counter = $counter+1) #end
Export | Clear
#pageViewLinks($itemsPerPage $totalPages $crtPageNumber)
